a class of dynam memori alloc algorithm anew dynam memorialloc algorithm the fibonacci system is introduc thi algorithm issimilar to but seem to have certain advantag over thebuddi system a gener is mention which includ both ofthese system as special case cacm octob 1973 hirschberg ds dynam storag alloc buddi system simul fibonacci fragment 389 4 32 4 39 ca731005 jb januari 20 197811 38 am 1389 4 2435 1552 4 2435 21624 2435 2435 4 2435 2596 4 2435 2768 42435 2845 4 2435 2902 4 2435 2955 4 24351184 5 2435 2435 5 2435 2435 5 2435 24355 2435 2596 5 2435 2747 5 2435 2768 52435 2845 5 2435 2902 5 2435 2911 5 24352955 5 2435 1051 6 2435 1062 6 2435 11846 2435 1184 6 2435 1184 6 2435 1184 62435 1184 6 2435 1211 6 2435 1552 6 24351879 6 2435 1879 6 2435 1879 6 2435 2736 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 62435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 24352435 6 2435 2498 6 2435 2596 6 2435 25966 2435 2598 6 2435 2734 6 2435 2734 62435 2736 6 2435 2747 6 2435 2747 6 24352747 6 2435 2768 6 2435 2768 6 2435 27736 2435 2773 6 2435 2983 6 2435
